definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once
cabin/the hold of a ship or airplane

sentences.english: Meg and gilbert are relaxing in first class .
sentences.chinese: 梅格和吉伯特在頭等艙裏休息。

sentences.english: In first - class stateroom cabin , you can get the best services but you must pay more.
sentences.chinese: 在頭等艙可以得到最好的服務，但那是你付錢買來的。

sentences.english: Buy international business and first class fares from consolidators.
sentences.chinese: 在聯運公司購買國際航班的商務艙和頭等艙機票。

sentences.english: At 35-inches wide, considerably wider than any other conventional First Class seat.
sentences.chinese: 英吋，比傳統頭等艙更爲寬大，讓您盡享極致奢華。

sentences.english: This ticket does not entitle you to travel first class.
sentences.chinese: 這張票不能使你享有坐頭等艙的資格。

sentences.english: This preferential ticket entitles you to travel first-class.
sentences.chinese: 憑這張優惠票，你可以坐頭等艙旅行。

sentences.english: Sorrry, the first class and business class have been booked already.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，頭等艙和商務艙已經訂滿了。

sentences.english: He was the sole passenger in first class to survive.
sentences.chinese: 他是頭等艙乘客中唯一的生還者。

sentences.english: Tourist class passengers are prohibited from using the first-class lounge.
sentences.chinese: 經濟艙乘客禁用頭等艙休息室。

sentences.english: The steamer possesses berthing accommodation for 750 passengers in the first class.
sentences.chinese: 這艘輪船有可供750位來客住的頭等艙位。

sentences.english: A:Sure we do. First-class or economy?
sentences.chinese: 當然有。頭等艙還是經濟艙？

sentences.english: Book me two first class seats on AA Flight 104 to New York.
sentences.chinese: 給我訂兩張去紐約的美航104班機的頭等艙機票。

sentences.english: Please book me one first class seat on AAL Flight 711 to New York?
sentences.chinese: 請給我訂一張去紐約的711航班的頭等艙座位。

sentences.english: Boat rolls out the country the whole world that heavy gold makes is the ritziest plane first -class stateroom cabin and official cabin .
sentences.chinese: 國航推出重金打造的全球最豪華飛機頭等艙和公務艙。

sentences.english: Then we would like two first class cabins if possible.
sentences.chinese: 那我們能不能買兩張頭等艙的票？

sentences.english: Yes, a first class single ticket, please, in the name of Wanghong.
sentences.chinese: 可以，那就預訂一張頭等艙單程票，名字是。
